markdownRemark.html:
Tulakan Ruangrong is a full-stack developer at the lab working on user interface, frontend for applications, and databases curated to our need. His work span across building an annotation tool, a frontend for virtual conference, and a web interface for scientific claim extraction. One of his work is developing a frontend and UI for Neuromatch Conference. His main framework is ReactJS and GatsbyJS.

Outside research, he also writes blog sometimes at tupleblog.

GitHub: @bluenex
